description: This crunchy, zesty salad pairs fresh carrots with grilled halloumi and zesty orange. Easy-to-make, this is a great recipe to serve to family and friends.
name: Sesame, Carrot, Halloumi & Orange Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 medium orange, segmented and pips removed

recipeInstructions.text: Fry the halloumi on a pan on a medium heat with the oil for 3 minutes while turning.
Add the sesame seeds and fry for a further 30 seconds and then remove all from the heat.
Serve the halloumi and sesame seeds on a bed of grated carrot and spring onions.
Drizzle the rice wine over the salad and garnish with segmented orange.
